answers.answer: They called me right away 2 days after my test to let me know I failed and had to do the 3.hr test :-(  did my 3 hr test this morning well see what happens
Should be two days or so, if you don't hear from them give them a call just to see. I had mine Friday and it was 132, thankfully my OB cuts off at 140 instead of 130
I had tesults the same day. May depend on your dr and his/ her lab.
Thanks ladies. They didn't tell me. I hope I don't have to do it again. I mean it wasn't too bad the drink they gave me tasted like flat watered down orange pop and it was cold too.
NOOOO!!!!! I gotta go back in for the 3 hour one because they said my results came back a little high. :/
I had mine done today my results came in at 135, but I have to wait til Monday to hear from my doc n see what see says...hopefully it's not to high.
They never told me what mine was at, just that it was a little high. My next doctors appointment I'm gonna ask them what mine was.
At my Drs the normal range is 70-130 I was a 134 so I also had to do 3 hr test but that one I passed it with flying colors.

My first one came back  with 132. Usually my Dr. is okay with anything under 135. However cause of my weight and it runs in my family. She wanted me to do the 3 hour test. 1 out of 5 blood tests came back high. That was enough to say I have gestational diabetes.
I had my 2hour test yesterday morning and had the results by the same evening
I had to do the 3hr test and two of my test came back slightly elevated, so I'm waiting now to get seen my a perinatal doctor to confirm my GD :(
So I found out today my first test came back 140 and my 3 hour test came back normal. Happy to know I'm in the clear! :)

question: How long till you find out results for it? I went to my doctors today and they just randomly decided to give me the test and test my blood levels and stuff.
title: Gestational Diabetic Test
